title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 & Warzone - CODMAS Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10000950/

Explore the new coastal map of Riparia and discover new lands covered in rivers, caves, and wonders. Narrated by Bindi Irwin.

This thriving new world is filled with new biomes, spanning the coast and the plateaus high above, covered in new flora. Enter vast cave networks connecting different locations, and swim through the rivers and streams separating the islands that dot the map.

Make your way through waters as the all new bully of the sea, Tylosaurus, a mosasaur that lived in the Late Cretaceous period. Use its speed and size to ambush land creatures or ram other marine life with its reinforced skull.

Hatch as a baby dinosaur today, and join a massive multiplayer world in a sandbox survival experience. Engage in dinosaur combat, complete quests, unlock new skins, and grow your pack to become the apex carnivore in this prehistoric land.

Available Now!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #pathoftitans
title: Path of Titans - Riparia Update Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

#ps5 #psvr2 #psvr2games #zerocalibervr

title: Zero Caliber VR - Launch Trailer | PS VR2 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Purgatory just got louder. The new Metal as Hell update tears open the gates with a surge of raw power, amped up and forged for demon-crushing domination.

Step into the storm armed with fresh instruments of torment: new items that can turn the tide in a heartbeat. New battlegrounds reverberate with carnage, while a towering foe now stalks the shadows of Rogue Angel Mode. So, grab your leathers, tighten that bullet belt, and get to work, Champion. 

The premium "Metal as Hell" DLC is now available to Season Pass owners or as a standalone purchase.

PlayStation 5: https://sabr.gg/PK-PlayStation

#ps5 #ps5games #painkiller 

Rated Mature
title: Painkiller - Metal As Hell DLC Trailer | PS5 Games

Ride the official Travis Pastrana compound! Rip through 4 epic tracks and go all out in the Freestyle zone - pure dirt, pure speed, pure freedom.

The world-famous playground where Travis Pastrana turns crazy ideas into history-making stunts.
At Pastranaland, you don’t just ride.
You ride like the legend himself.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games#MXvsATV #LegendsAreMade
title: Mx vs ATV Legends - Pastranaland Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Aaero2: Black Razor Edition Is Out Now: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014832

Experience an exhilarating on-rails rhythm shooter where you trace ribbons of light, releasing the energy in the music while speeding through stunning alien environments and aiming to perfect your highest score! Fly solo or go B2B with a friend, unleashing devastating missiles and raining cannon fire to the beat of the Black Razor Records and Monstercat soundtrack.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Aaero2: Black Razor Edition - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games
